notes: P0 backlog items are now closed: BL-025 and BL-014 are Done (2026-02-24) after refreshed deterministic evidence (`TestEvidence/locusq_production_p0_selftest_20260224T032239Z.json`, `TestEvidence/reaper_headless_render_20260224T032300Z/status.json`, `TestEvidence/locusq_smoke_suite_spatial_bl014_20260224T032355Z.log`, `TestEvidence/locusq_phase_2_6_acceptance_suite_spatial_bl014_20260224T032355Z.log`). Existing Done closures for BL-009/BL-010/BL-011/BL-015/BL-016/BL-019/BL-024 remain unchanged, and the active queue now starts at P1. BL-017 Slice C companion app MVP structure documented (directory layout, motion setup, UDP packet serialization contract, and pairing-flow README outline). BL-017 Slice C companion MVP implementation landed under companion/ with packet serialization unit test and CLI smoke validation; manual AirPods hardware lane pending.

phase_history.notes: Creative brief and parameter spec authored.
High-complexity phased architecture selected.
skill_plan package accepted: ADR-0002/0003/0004/0005 and scene-state-contract authored; research synthesis aligned for skill_design and skill_impl handoff.
WebView design refreshed to v3: persistent viewport invariants and adaptive per-mode control rail behavior (width tokens + scroll memory) documented and aligned to preview/implementation shell.
Implementation phases 2.1-2.6 are complete. Phase 2.4 acceptance is now closed via deterministic probe plus suite evidence; Phase 2.5/2.6 acceptance and host-load checks remain stable.
Phase 2.1-2.3 validation completed: harness ctest 45/45 passed, LocusQ smoke suite 4/4 passed, pluginval GUI-context SUCCESS evidence captured.
Phase 2.4 acceptance closed: deterministic physics probe 5/5 pass, physics spatial-motion + zero-g drift scenarios pass, and phase-pure suite rollup 2 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL.
Phase 2.5 acceptance suite passed hard gates (9 scenarios: 8 pass, 1 warn, 0 fail). Residual warning tracks allocation trend under profiler while CPU budget/deadline criteria pass.

Phase 2.6 closeout validated (historical baseline): acceptance suite hard-pass (2 PASS / 1 WARN / 0 FAIL) with allocation warning. Superseded by implementation_phase_2_6c_allocation_free (3 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL, perf_allocation_free=true).
Documentation baseline standardized: metadata headers, standards/invariants/ADR references, and validation trend logging.

Harness sanity passed (45/45). Focused acceptance matrix executed (Phase 2.6 + Phase 2.5 regression + full-system + host-edge), with PASS_WITH_WARNING and published deltas in qa_output/suite_result.json.

Local macOS ship complete from universal (x86_64+arm64) release build. Packaged VST3/AU/Standalone into dist/LocusQ-v0.1.0-macOS with BUILD_MANIFEST + archive and verified pluginval/standalone smoke on ship artifacts.
Post-ship UI runtime recovery started to restore host interactivity when viewport/WebGL init fails.
Harness-first UI interaction smoke matrix executed (DSP/host proxy coverage). Result PASS_WITH_WARNING with stable suite counts and allocation warning trend retained.
Manual host UI acceptance is complete. Blocker rerun results are now fully green in Reaper on 2026-02-21 (UI-04/UI-06/UI-07/UI-12 PASS).

Viewport interactivity and calibration visualization wiring landed: state-backed emitter pick/select/move with APVTS drag updates, local emitter identity in scene snapshots, and calibration speaker-level/profile visualization from native status payloads.
Harness-first full acceptance rerun completed (DSP + host + UI proxy matrix). PASS_WITH_WARNING with only allocation trend warning; manual host UI checklist deferred to 2026-02-20 per user.
UI control-path/state-sync closure refreshed with fresh evidence logs: JS syntax gate PASS, VST3 rebuild PASS, smoke suite PASS (4/4), and animation smoke PASS.
Phase 2.6c allocation-free pass complete: full-system CPU scenario now passes perf_allocation_free=true with zero allocations; phase 2.6 acceptance suite moved to PASS (3/3).
ADR-0005 accepted: closeout docs freshness gate locked. Routing/automation decisions reconfirmed and canonical status/evidence/readme/changelog sync required for phase closeout.

Host-interaction closure prep complete: Cartesian viewport drag now writes APVTS Cartesian coordinates via new pos_x/pos_y/pos_z relays+attachments; timeline native bridge now rejects non-finite time and clamps to duration; focused headless JS/build/smoke/animation/suite/host-edge checks all pass.

Pluginval automation segfault mitigation landed: mode-transition scene registration sync and safer emitter unregister semantics remove stale emitter audio-pointer reads; deterministic seed 0x2a331c6 now passes.
Expanded processor bus-layout support to mono/stereo/quad output (including discrete(4)) and validated renderer/smoke runs in 4-channel QA mode.
Added explicit quad output channel mapping (FL, FR, RL, RR), scene-state output-layout telemetry, and stereo/quad regression suites.
QA harness CI now includes explicit 4-channel host-edge/full-system matrix coverage and a seeded pluginval stress lane on macOS.
Renderer now applies per-block emitter budget culling + activity gates with deterministic ordering under load; scene-state telemetry and high-emitter QA stress coverage are in place and passing.

Snapshot/preset compatibility hardening landed: snapshot layout schema metadata persisted + restore-time migration for legacy/mismatched layout payloads, emitter preset schema v2 added with v1 compatibility, and dedicated stereo/quad migration QA checks pass.

Renderer guardrail trend coverage expanded with final-quality high-emitter stress and a rollup suite across 48k/512 and 96k/512 in both 2ch/4ch runtime modes; all runs are deadline-safe and allocation-free.

Expanded snapshot migration QA matrix coverage across mono/stereo/quad runtime layouts by adding explicit metadata-forcing modes (mono/stereo/quad + legacy strip), new mismatch scenarios, and dedicated 1ch/2ch/4ch suite passes.

Harness sanity and host validation passed, but non-manual acceptance matrix failed due reproducible phase 2.5 room-depth signal-present regression; phase 2.8 stereo/quad suites also emitted attenuation-level warnings.
Post-fix non-manual acceptance matrix rerun is clear of hard failures after restoring phase 2.5 room-depth signal margin; only known phase 2.8 stereo/quad attenuation soft warnings remain.

Incremental Stage 2 WebView shell aligned to Design v3 is now the default incremental route with persistent Three.js viewport lifecycle, adaptive rail widths, per-mode rail scroll memory, emitter-only timeline visibility, and focused working control bindings (mode/rend_quality/size_link/size_uniform/phys_enable/anim_*).

Incremental Stage 3 now extends the working Stage 2 shell with one fuller Emitter Audio block (emit_mute toggle, emit_gain slider, phys_gravity_dir choice) and live status reflection while preserving the existing direct relay bindings and viewport continuity contract.

Incremental Stage 4 extends the Stage 3 Emitter Audio block with emit_solo toggle plus emit_spread and emit_directivity sliders, and expands live status reflection while keeping direct relay bindings and the persistent viewport contract intact.

Added standalone Stage 4 self-test automation that drives live WebView controls (emit_mute, emit_solo, emit_gain, emit_spread, emit_directivity, phys_gravity_dir) and emits machine-readable pass/fail evidence without coordinate automation.
Updated the macOS UI PR gate to run the Stage 4 standalone self-test as the default gate (Appium off, coordinate-smoke optional), and verified a passing gate run.

Incremental Stage 5 extends Stage 4 with renderer core controls (rend_master_gain, rend_distance_model, rend_doppler, rend_room_enable, rend_phys_rate, rend_viz_mode), promotes Stage 5 as the default incremental route, and validates Stage 5 self-test + UI gate.

Incremental Stage 6 extends Stage 5 with calibrate core controls (cal_spk_config, cal_mic_channel, cal_test_level, cal_test_type), promotes Stage 6 as the default incremental route, and validates Stage 6 self-test + UI gate.

Incremental Stage 7 extends Stage 6 with calibrate speaker output routing controls (cal_spk1_out, cal_spk2_out, cal_spk3_out, cal_spk4_out), promotes Stage 7 as the default incremental route, and validates Stage 7 self-test plus UI gate.

Incremental Stage 8 extends Stage 7 with calibrate capture/progress UI (start-abort action, progress bar, speaker-status rows, message reflection), promotes Stage 8 as the default incremental route, and validates Stage 8 self-test plus UI gate.

Fixed calibration abort/restart correctness and added conservative auto-detected calibration speaker config/routing from active output channels with manual-override preservation; Stage 8 self-test now includes explicit Step 9/10 start-abort assertions.

Stage 8 calibrate capture now wires the RE-DETECT ROUTING action to a native bridge call and live routing status refresh. Stage 8 self-test expanded to assert redetect callback path plus v3 parity invariants: adaptive rail width per mode, timeline visibility contract, per-mode rail scroll memory, and mode-switch camera continuity.
Added detailed Stage 9-13 parity execution checklists with task-level acceptance gates and Codex mega-prompts; linked from parity tracker/docs index and validated docs freshness gate.

Incremental Stage 9 adds emitter identity/position/size/physics/animation/preset controls with direct JUCE bridge wiring, promotes Stage 9 as default incremental route, and validates Stage 9 self-test plus UI PR gate.

Incremental Stage 10 completes renderer rail parity (scene/master/speakers/spatialization/room/global physics/visualization), adds relay+attachment coverage for new renderer parameters, and promotes Stage 10 self-test as the default UI PR gate with passing self-test/gate/resource evidence.

Stage 11 incremental route landed with calibrate setup/test readouts, deterministic start-abort-measure-again transitions, routing re-detect current/auto map reflection, ASCII-safe status sanitation, and explicit profile lifecycle semantics (`NO PROFILE`/`MEASURING`/`PROFILE READY`) in rail and viewport overlay. Automated Stage 11 self-test + UI PR gate pass; manual DAW checklist follow-up remains open.

Stage 12 applies style/token polish, gates debug diagnostics behind self-test or explicit debug mode, promotes Stage 12 as the primary incremental route, preserves Stage 9-11 fallback resource paths, and validates passing Stage 12 self-test/UI gate/resource probe evidence.

Stage 13 automated acceptance sweep is complete with zero failures across Stage 12 self-test/UI gate, targeted non-UI matrix (smoke + phase 2.5 + phase 2.6 + host-edge), pluginval strictness-5, and standalone smoke. Manual DAW checklist rerun remains pending before parity signoff. Stage 14 contract-alignment docs/checklists are now prepared (ADR-0006, drift ledger, release checklist); manual DAW signoff remains the gating item for parity/release decision.
Published Stage 14 comprehensive review findings and added deterministic macOS build/install host-cache automation for REAPER/AU freshness (auto-quit option, cache prune, hash verification).
Implemented runtime inter-emitter physics interaction path (`rend_phys_interact`) and wired Stage 12 relay/attachment/UI + self-test coverage to remove deferred/no-op drift.
Stage 16-A complete: added dedicated AirAbsorption distance sweep, Calibration sweep/capture proxy, Keyframe 8s loop playback, and emit_dir spatial-effect QA scenarios under qa/scenarios/.
Stage 16-D complete: compared Section 7 viewport spec to production UI, identified missing motion trails/velocity vectors, and accepted ADR-0008 deferring telemetry overlays to post-v1.
Stage 17-A complete: build/install prerequisite PASS and portable operator rerun PASS_WITH_NA (`DEV-01..DEV-05=PASS`, `DEV-06=N/A` external mic unavailable).
Stage 17-B complete: docs freshness validation passed with 0 warnings.
Stage 17-C complete: changelog frozen for v1.0.0-ga, CMake project version set to 1.0.0, README release section updated, and build/install validation passed.
Stage 17-D complete: reviewed draft-pre-release tag, closed Stage 17-A/B/C concerns, pushed v1.0.0-ga tag, and published GitHub release (https://github.com/joshband/LocusQ/releases/tag/v1.0.0-ga).

Implemented BL-015/BL-014/BL-006/BL-007 in production viewport: all-emitter rendering + selection styling, listener/speaker + RMS overlays, aim indicators, motion trails, and velocity vectors. Added production self-test checks UI-P1-015/UI-P1-014/UI-P1-006/UI-P1-007 with synthetic-scene fallback handling.

Automated validation pass captured after retry hardening: production self-test PASS (after three UI-P1-015 fail captures), UI PR gate PASS, smoke suite WARN-only (3 PASS / 1 WARN / 0 FAIL), phase 2.6 suite PASS (3 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL), docs freshness PASS.

BL-008 closure pass: added explicit production self-test assertion UI-P1-008 verifying per-speaker RMS telemetry drives speaker meter/ring overlay ordering; rebuilt standalone and reran shared gate + spatial suites + docs freshness.

Resume baseline realignment: production self-test initially failed on BL-009 headphone timeout while BL-009 was still Todo. UI-P1-009 assertion is now opt-in via `selftest_bl009=1`; post-patch production self-test, shared gate, spatial suites, and docs freshness all passed.
Manual DAW blocker rerun follow-up confirmed all blocker rows passing after transport/layout fixes: UI-04 PASS, UI-06 PASS, UI-07 PASS, UI-12 PASS.

Closed BL-006/BL-007/BL-008 using automated evidence: production self-test pass including UI-P1-006/UI-P1-007/UI-P1-008, shared UI gate pass, spatial smoke WARN-only, phase 2.6 suite PASS, and docs freshness PASS.
Design artifact added for BL-017 Slice C companion app MVP structure and packet contract alignment to HeadTrackingBridge.
Implemented companion Swift Package MVP (motion service, UDP sender, packet serializer, CLI entrypoint) with deterministic serialization unit test pass; hardware manual validation pending.

pluginval_results.output_summary: Strictness-5 in-process pluginval run passed during Stage 13 acceptance sweep on promoted Stage 12 artifacts.
pluginval_results.environment_note: In restricted/headless contexts, pluginval may abort in AppKit/HIServices before plugin load; classify as environment_blocked when observed.

validation.implementation_phase_2_4_status_note: Acceptance closed: deterministic physics probe (5/5), physics spatial-motion and zero-g drift scenarios (PASS), and phase-pure phase 2.4 suite rollup (2 PASS / 0 WARN / 0 FAIL).
validation.implementation_phase_2_5_status_note: Phase 2.5 acceptance suite executed with scenario-level perceptual proxies and real perf profiling. Hard gates passed; allocation tracking remains a warning for trending.

qa_phase_2_5_acceptance_results.warning_detail: Residual warning trend preserved; no hard-gate regressions in focused matrix run.

validation.implementation_phase_2_6_status_note: Phase 2.6 acceptance is closed with allocation-free full-system criteria now passing. Full-system 8-emitter draft CPU gate passes deadline + avg/p95 block-time and perf_allocation_free=true. Host edge lifecycle matrix remains pass across SR/BS variants, and plugin build/pluginval/standalone checks remain stable.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7a_status_note: P0 runtime patch is automation-green and manual DAW blocker rerun is now fully green (UI-04/UI-06/UI-07/UI-12 PASS on 2026-02-21). Manual 2.7a closeout blockers are resolved.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7b_status_note: Phase 2.7b implementation landed: viewport emitter pick/select/move is wired to APVTS position parameters, calibration speaker/meter/profile visuals are now driven by native calibration status data, and post-change smoke regression suite passed (4/4).
validation.implementation_phase_2_7c_status_note: Phase 2.7c control-path/state-sync closure validated on refreshed run: tabs/toggles/dropdowns/value steppers remain relay-backed, UI-state persistence bridge remains active, and 2.7c JS/build/smoke/animation evidence is green.
validation.implementation_phase_2_6c_status_note: Audio-thread allocation warning removed for phase 2.6 full-system path: perf_total_allocations=0 and perf_allocation_free=true in allocation probe and official full-system scenario.
validation.implementation_phase_2_7d_status_note: Phase 2.7d control-path closure remains validated; 2.7e added pluginval automation guard (mode-transition registration sync) and deterministic seed repro now passes.
implementation_phase_2_7d_manual_host_on: DAW-embedded tab/rail interaction focus and host-automation behavior
Viewport drag persistence/feel in Cartesian mode under embedded WebView input routing
Calibration START/ABORT lifecycle with real DAW I/O routing and profile-ready persistence
validation.implementation_phase_2_8_status_note: Processor bus-layout validation now accepts mono/stereo input with mono/stereo/quad output; focused 4-channel renderer and smoke checks passed.
validation.implementation_phase_2_8b_status_note: Explicit quad output map + output-layout telemetry + mono/stereo/quad regression suites landed and passed.
validation.implementation_phase_2_9_status_note: CI workflow expanded: qa-critical now runs explicit quad matrix scenarios and qa-pluginval-seeded-stress runs deterministic strictness-5 seeded sweeps (0x2a331c6..0x2a331ca).
validation.implementation_phase_2_10_status_note: Spatial renderer now enforces a deterministic top-priority 8-emitter per-block budget with near-silence culling and telemetry exposure; baseline/high-emitter/suite/smoke scenarios all pass allocation-free gates.
validation.implementation_phase_2_10b_status_note: Renderer CPU trend coverage now includes final-quality high-emitter stress and rollup-suite matrix runs at 48k/512 + 96k/512 in 2ch/4ch; all runs pass deadline and allocation-free gates.
validation.implementation_phase_2_11_status_note: Snapshot and preset compatibility now includes output-layout schema metadata persistence, restore-time migration for legacy/mismatched layouts, and QA migration checks in stereo + quad runtime paths.
validation.implementation_phase_2_11b_status_note: Snapshot migration emulation now spans legacy-strip plus forced mono/stereo/quad metadata, and dedicated mono/stereo/quad runtime matrix suites all pass for layout-mismatch state-roundtrip coverage.

test_non_manual_acceptance_matrix_post_2.resolved_regression: locusq_25_room_depth_no_coloring signal_present restored to rms=-78.2862 dBFS (min -80.0 dBFS)

validation.bl016_transport_contract_status_note: BL-016 sequence guard + stale fallback + smoothing contract is implemented and validated; closeout evidence refreshed on 2026-02-23 (self-test PASS, smoke WARN-only baseline, phase 2.6 PASS, docs freshness PASS).
validation.p1_viewport_slice_status_note: BL-006/BL-007/BL-008, BL-014, BL-015, and BL-019 are closed (Done) on refreshed automated evidence, including strict BL-014 closeout reruns on 2026-02-24.
validation.p1_bl009_selftest_scope_note: UI-P1-009 remains opt-in (`selftest_bl009=1`) for dedicated BL-009 and regression lanes; BL-009 closeout is now complete with deterministic contract/profile evidence refresh (2026-02-23).

framework_selection.rationale: 3D spatial visualization requires WebGL (Three.js). Complex multi-mode UI (calibration wizard, keyframe editor, 3D viewport) is far more practical in HTML/JS. Keeps the 3D layer modular and replaceable as requested.

phase_notes.p1_bl009_selftest_scope_note: UI-P1-009 remains opt-in (`selftest_bl009=1`) and now reports deterministic Steam init diagnostics (compiled/available/stage/error/runtime lib/missing symbol) for BL-009 closeout/regression verification.
phase_notes.bl011_clap_slice2_selftest_scope_note: UI-P2-011 remains opt-in (`selftest_bl011=1`) and validates deterministic CLAP lifecycle telemetry in scene snapshots for both CLAP and non-CLAP runtime contexts.
phase_notes.bl011_clap_namespace_fix: skip CLAP activation-time emit_color host parameter seed in syncSceneGraphRegistrationForMode
phase_notes.bl015_all_emitter_scope_note: UI-P1-015 verifies deterministic all-emitter selection vs non-selection styling in production viewport flow while retaining BL-014 and BL-019 passing checks.
phase_notes.bl019_visual_diagnostics_scope_note: UI-P1-019 validates force vectors, collision indicators, and short-horizon trajectory preview under physics lens toggle/mix controls.
phase_notes.bl022_choreography_scope_note: UI-P1-022 validates choreography pack apply/save/load workflow for orbit/pendulum/swarm_arc/rise_fall timeline motifs with preset metadata persistence.
phase_notes.bl025_emitter_uiux_scope_note: Covers EMITTER IA simplification, position mode clarity, unified motion model, preset lifecycle hardening, local-vs-remote authority cues, and responsive visual language updates.
